Project.name: AsyncStub Utility for Haxe
Project.Description: The Asynchronous Stub utility consists of a Proxy which can be extended for the purpose of simulating asynchronous activity, by way of a random timer.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in Version 1.0 * A port of the AsyncStub Utility for ActionScript 3 * Standard and MultiCore versions are included.
Project.Installation: Prerequisites * You must have Haxe installed. * You must have PureMVC Haxe Standard or MultiCore installed. Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a AsyncStub_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\AsyncStub_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
